column3: [' (StepDescription: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board)']
[' (StepDescription: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar)']
[' (StepDescription: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla
[' (StepDescription: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel)']
[' (StepDescription: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar)']
[' (StepDescription: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter)']
[' (StepDescription: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel)']
[' (StepDescription: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape
column4: about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps
column5: but not so tight that the filling leaks)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart)']
[' (StepDescription: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife
column4: leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll)']
perpendicular to the length of the roll)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks)']
[" (StepDescription: Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top)"]
[' (StepDescription: pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice)']
[' (StepDescription: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel)']
[' (StepDescription: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel)']
[' (StepDescription: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel)']
[' (StepDescription: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate)']
